info.name: Rahul's habitrpg style
info.description:
Habitrpg's website has lot of whitespace. This style removes this empty space so you can see more of your tasks without scrolling. 
Also, the tasks columns are wider.
info.additionalInfo:
v1: 

Tweaked 'Habitrpg-The adventure game' style to include tags, remove some whitespace, and make header smaller, removed subscribe button.
